All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
JobController
This is the controller class that maps the incoming requests from http://localhost:3000 to the api/v1/jobs endpoint.
JobModel
This is the Job Entity that gets saved in the database.
JobNotFoundException
This exception is thrown when the ID of the job doesn't match with any jobId in the database.
JobPortalApplication
Starting Point of the Spring Boot Application
JobRepository
The repository layer containing information about Jobs.
JobService
The service layer for all job related processing.
JobType
Enum class for defining Job Type for a Company
RequestParameterNullException
This exception is thrown when the request body parameters are null.
UserApplicationRequestModel
This class represents the JSON request that the control ler would accept and create a UserModel to persist in the database.
UserApplicationsRepository
The repository layer containing information about users and the jobs they applied.
UserList
 
UserModel
This is the User Entity that gets saved in the database.
UserService
The service layer for all user related processing.
WorkModel
Enum class for defining Work Model for a Company
